title: WooCommerce Phone Validator
name: woo-phone-validator
description: Forces validation of WooCommerce billing phone field on checkout and billing address edit page
author: Preciousomonze

scripts.build: npm run cleancss && npm run uglify && npm run lint:js && npm run php-beautify && npm run makepot
scripts.makepot: wpi18n addtextdomain woo-phone-validator; wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file woo-phone-validator.pot --type plugin --main-file wc-pv.php --exclude node_modules,.wordpress-org,vendor
scripts.compress-zip-offload: npm run compress-zip && npm run offload-zip
scripts.readme-assets:trunk: npm run cleancss && npm run uglify && npm run lint:js && npm run compress-zip-offload
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run compress-zip && npm run offload-zip
